status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Hi luoyuxia , could you help take a look?

Thanks for reporting it. I'll fix it as soon as possible.

The reason is it will read any path first, but the test assumes it'll always read the specific path first, thus cause the unstable test.
